Description:
Your New Residential Community
This newly completed land estate in Kangaroo Flat offers everything you need in a new residential community. Located in walking distance to everything Kangaroo Flat has to offer including shops, schools, bus stops, train station, sporting facilities and parks, only an 8 minute drive to the Bendigo CBD and on the Melbourne side of town what is not to like? With lots ranging from 304m2 to 497m2 all fully serviced and in a secured private community which offers maintenance of the common areas. Wireless Street Gardens would be a fantastic location for a host of buyers including first home buyers, professionals and retirees. Titles available so the lots can settle as soon as required also with house and land packages available from local builders!!

Description:
Build Your Dream Home in a Brilliant Location
Not a fan of the huge cookie-cutter estates? Looking for something in an established area and close everything?
Boasting prime position with the CBD just 5 minutes away you can enjoy our famous Café culture, yet still on the Melbourne side of Bendigo where you can jump straight onto the Calder Highway and be in the City in no time.
Given its great location, this is a brilliant opportunity for investors to build investment property as it's sure to be popular with tenants.
Don't miss this fantastic opportunity to get your hands on a parcel of land in an established street just moments from Primary/Secondary Schools, ALDI, Kmart, Bunnings, Woolworths and much more!
Call Matt Ingram for more info.

Description:
Comfortable Home, Big Block with Great Shedding & Supreme Convenience!
When comfort, security and convenience are key factors for your next home, you will want this one at the top of your list. This terrific three bedroom home will be so much fun to live in. You can spread out in style in the huge versatile space upstairs or if you prefer entertaining alfresco there's always the large pergola right at the back door. The landscaped block is a very comfortable size at almost a quarter of an acre and infrastructure includes not only the home but also two good sized sheds safe and sound within excellent colorbond fencing. On top of this you will find yourself just a short walk from either Lansell Square or the shopping district in Kangaroo Flat with great access to the freeway or train station for a short commute to Melbourne, Castlemaine etcetera.
The home itself has everything you need on the ground floor including three bedrooms with built-in-robes, two of which have reverse cycle split systems for personal heating and cooling, these rooms are serviced by a clean modern three piece bathroom and the separate loo which we all know is ideal. The laundry is a very clever use of space tucked away behind sliding doors in true European style. A small hallway from the pretty front door provides privacy to the lounge room where you are kept comfortable with ducted heating and cooling, and this opens onto the kitchen so refreshments during your favourite shows are close and handy.
The pristine kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances including the dishwasher and rangehood, the built-in-pantry is just what you need and the gorgeous timber benchtop highlights the lovely colonial windows and French-doors which open from the dining area directly onto the beautiful concreted outdoor entertaining area under a large pergola with its own ceiling fan, just looking at it, it's easy to imagine the fun times to be had and memories to be made.
The same can be said of the huge upstairs room, again with a reverse cycle split system and the stairway also conveniently adjoining the kitchen-dining area. This is such a big space with almost a full wall of windows for an elevated treetop outlook, that it inspires thoughts of a theatre room or fantastic party room, a games room for the kids (or for the big kids), a parents retreat.... let your imagination run wild. Also one of the windows was a sliding door so maybe you'd like to reinstate a balcony?
The block is landscaped with bark chips in the front yard, well established leafy green low maintenance plants, some lawn for a soft play area out the back where you can watch the kids and pets from the kitchen, pergola or either one of the two great sheds that will be the reason he wants this house. One of the sheds is a huge 6 x 12 metres and the other is the original mancave, both have concrete floors, power and lights, but you won't need to take up your shed space for your day to day cars as a double carport under the rumpus room takes care of that.
Furthermore when convenience matters this one takes the cake. Just a short walk to Lansell Square or the shopping strip in central Kangaroo Flat with every amenity you could hope for plus a few more. Not to mention the added benefit of being on the Melbourne side of Bendigo and ideally positioned one street back from the main road offering a quite spot with great freeway access, or if you prefer public transport you're not far from the train station for a quick commute to Melbourne if you like.
If you can't make the open you should call the agent for a private inspection, she's always happy to help and properties like this go fast.
Internal area
140m²

Description:
Brick Veneer Home on Crusoe Road
It's with great pleasure as the listing agent, that I invite you to come and look through this solid Brick Veneer home situated in the popular neighbourhood of Crusoe road in Kangaroo Flat, only a quick drive to Lansell Square shopping centre, Kangaroo Flat train station, Kangaroo Flat primary school, medical clinic and Bunnings warehouse.
When you walk through the front to the house, you will be amazed by the blossom of flowers and beautiful garden. Well-maintained backyard and the practical size patio will give you the perfect entertaining space to catch up with friends and family. Step outside to a gardener's delight with well-manicured garden plus veggie patches, full of fresh vegetables.
This home consists of 4 bedrooms, 3 with built in robes, main has ensuite and walk in robes, plus a family bathroom. Spacious kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven, all in good condition. Split cooling and heating system provide comfort all year round. There is solar power and a hot water system, both are definitely a highlight and have potential to save you money in electricity charges. It's also worth mentioning that the master room is situated at the back of the house, ideal for peace,quiet and privacy. Lock up double roller door garage with sheds at the backyard, which provide plenty of storage. It also has secured panel boundary fencing. A perfect family home, all you need to do is pack up your furniture and move in. Don't miss out, enquire today!
(E&OE)
非常荣幸能够代理这套房子，我邀请您参观这座坚固的砖房，它位于Kangaroo Flat区Crusoe大道附近，仅几步之遥即可到达Lansell Square购物中心，Kangaroo Flat火车站，Kangaroo Flat小学, 社区诊所和Bunnings五金店。
当您穿过房屋前部时，色彩绚丽的月季搭配与时尚美丽的花园会让您惊叹不已。
维护优良的大后院和超大的凉棚将为您提供完美的娱乐空间，与朋友和家人见面非常舒心。无论是春天的朵朵花卉，夏天的串串大粒葡萄，还是秋冬季的斑斓灌木叶，都将为您在视觉上添加了无比的幸福感。
修剪整齐的花园外加装满新鲜蔬菜的菜园，也将为喜欢园艺的你带来叹为观止的惊喜！
该房屋包括四间卧室，其中三间带有内置衣柜，主卧室更是设有套间和步入式衣柜。另有一间独立的家庭浴室，浴缸泡澡舒服贴心。
开放式明亮又宽敞的厨房，自带高级燃气灶具，电烤箱。
分体式冷暖空调全年为您提升居住舒适感。
该房屋的太阳能热水器无疑更是一大亮点，您可以节省很多电费。
还值得一提的是，主人房位于房屋的后部，因此更具备安静舒适和私密性。
带锁的卷闸门大车库，可以存放四辆私家车。后院还有小库房可供作为额ࣨ...

Description:

New to market is this magnificent 544m2 block, located in the Lakeside Park Estate in Kangaroo Flat.

Description:
Amazing condition unit close to everything!
Attention downsizers, investors and first home buyers looking to purchase an amazing condition, generously sized unit close to Kangaroo Flat's shopping centers, public transport and best facilities- the search is over!
This mint condition home is tucked away quietly in one of Kangaroo Flats best 'pockets' and located only a stone's throw away from everything you need and more.
Situated on an ideal 286 Sqm Block (approx) the home offers an 'easy care' maintenance approach, but still enough space to enjoy a small yet established garden and fernery. The property also offers a good amount of car accommodation with single car garage and plenty of space to park a car at the front of the block also.
The 20 year old unit presents in amazing condition both inside and out. The layout of the home offers practicality and generous sizes in all areas. Each bedroom is large in size with plenty of natural light and built in robes. The bathroom is centered between the two bedrooms and makes for easy access, it is completed with a shower, separate bath and vanity.
The over-sized lounge-room offers an array of natural light and plenty of space to configure many living arrangement options, the perfect space to enjoy a morning cup of tea in the sun! The dining and kitchen area flows on well from the lounge and offers an ideal U shape orientation. The kitchen supplies plenty of storage and bench space with good condition appliances. The kitchen window provides a lovely outlook to the front yard as well as a tranquil setting looking into the fernery located in the backyard.
The backyard is a low maintenance undercover setting that can be enjoyed all year round without the headache of ongoing garden work!
This is an amazing home in immaculate condition so close to everything! Perfect for many walks of life, inquire today!
(E&OE)

Description:
Space, Style & Luxury.
Luxurious grand living with an abundance of space.
Set on the highest elevation in its street sits this grand home in a sought-after and quiet nook of Kangaroo Flat.
Stepping onto the property the beautifully presented, immaculate front gardens and views of the adjacent nature reserve sets the scene for the home's style.
Inside you are greeted by your grand entry boasting decorative tiled flooring and recessed ceiling with the first bedroom to the right.
Your awe-inspiring large open plan living and dining features a built-in storage cabinet, ornate cornices and quality finishes. The kitchen offers stone benchtops, bulk head displays, walk-in pantry, high-end appliances and island bench with built-in wine cabinet.
A grand rumpus room, four bedrooms - three with built-in robes and a master with a walk-in and ensuite large modern bathroom, a spacious laundry with a powder room and third separate toilet adds to the home's features.
The property continues to shine outdoors with a large 6m x 10m quality alfresco with Merbau decking and built-in barbeque. Step down into the rest of the yard and you'll discover a gazebo and 6m x 6m powered and concreted shed with side street access.
Ducted reverse cycle refrigerated air conditioning, ducted vacuuming, automatic security window shutters, high ceilings, solar panels and water tanks.
Views of the reserve across the road, Forest Lake around the corner and a short drive to Kangaroo Flat's shops, amenities and schools this stunning home is sure to impress.
Contact agent Jesse Forbes for an inspection today.
Internal area
269m²

Value and Convenience
This low maintenance two bedroom brick veneer home is positioned across the road from the Crusoe Heights Reserve, and close to the popular Lansell Square Shopping Centre. Features include:
Two bedrooms, both with built-in robes and ceiling fans
Caesarstone benchtop, freestanding gas oven and cooktop
Open plan meals and lounge area at the front of the home
Low maintenance front and rear garden, with secure gated access
Ample sized garden shed for storage
This home is ideal for downsizing, or a fantastic addition to your investment portfolio. Dont delay in booking your inspection with the Heard & Co. Sales Team today.

Description:
PERFECT INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
Set on a good sized corner block is this modern two-bedroom house. Tastefully updated with feature wall, new wall gas heater and new stove in kitchen. Both bedrooms have built-in robes, main with a walk-through bathroom and both bedrooms have new carpet. Evaporative cooling and gas hot water service. Immaculately presented and well positioned on a good sized block. Small undercover outdoor area and garden shed at rear. Walking distance to the Kangaroo Flat Train Station and short walk to the main street shopping strip with supermarket, doctors, hotels, schools and recreation areas. If you're looking to add to your rental portfolio then this one is for you or if you wish to downsize with a low maintenance property that is close to everything then this property deserves a look.

Description:
Close to everything
Nestled in the heart of Kangaroo Flat, a stone's throw from the Kangaroo Flat shopping strip sits this classically designed weatherboard residence. Sitting on a generous corner block of over 800m2, it is ready for a new owner. The house stands proudly in near original (but well maintained ) condition that could be moved into without any further outlay.
It has three good sized bedrooms, living area with air conditioning and gas heating and a neat and functional kitchen with plenty of storage and bench space. There is a secure back yard for pets, kids or to grow your own veggies. With the added bonus of an outdoor entertaining area, 4x6m powered shed with concrete slab, 3x3m garden shed and undercover parking for two cars.
First home, last home or a solid investment ...this home has plenty to offer.

Description:
BRICK HOME WITH POSSIBILITY & POTENTIAL
Located within easy access of both Lansell Square and the schools, shops and amenities of Kangaroo Flat, this conveniently situated property is also positioned on the Melbourne side of the city. The spacious allotment is both wide and long ,and double gates from the front of the home and from the street at the rear of the block provides vehicle entry from both sides.
The brick home is solidly built and neatly presented both indoors and out. The front door opens into a lounge room which wraps around to a dining space and leads into a good-sized kitchen. The kitchen provides plenty of storage and modern appliances, and a door from this area opens into a spacious sun room, which serves as an additional living space.
A door from the kitchen opens into a hallway leading down to three bedrooms, all with built-in robes and the master offering a ceiling fan. This area of the house also includes a family bathroom, separate toilet, large laundry and linen closet.
Doors from the large sunroom open at either end to the outdoors. At one side is the undercover tandem carport that includes a roller door protecting vehicles from the street and at the other side, an alfresco area and a large shed. A smaller garden shed provides further storage and established trees divide the yard. The back section of the block, which can be accessed via the rear street, is largely level and offers the perfect option to build additional properties or subdivide (STCA).
Additional features include:
Ducted cooling throughout
Ceiling fan in master and wall heater in main lounge
Modern kitchen appliances including four-burner gas cooktop and oven
Shed (6m x 5m)
Garden shed
Vehicle access to rear yard from driveway
Rear vehicle access from Railway Place
Subdivision potential (STCA)
Absolutely ideal for an investor, this property is perfectly set up to garner immediate rental income and the space and accessibility of the allotment offers additional opportunity. Close to bus stops, train station, schools, shops and more, this home is ideally located and offers great potential for a buyer with vision.

Description:
Well Presented 3 Bedroom Home
This extremely well-presented, approx. 8-year-old home offers 3 carpeted bedrooms, main with ensuite and large walk-in robe, and the other bedrooms with built-in robes. Tiled floors are throughout the wet areas.
The open-plan area includes a large carpeted lounge and a kitchen/meals area with a dishwasher. Gas heating and evaporative cooling are ducted throughout.
Outside offers a double garage with remote door, an alfresco area which is perfect for those summer BBQs, solar hot water and landscaped gardens.
Located in a quiet street and positioned close to the ever-growing, popular Kangaroo Flat. It is only but a short drive to the expanding Lansell Square shopping centre, and then onto Bendigo's amenities.
If you're looking to downsize with nothing more to do, then look no further, as this home is sure to interest you.
Inspect now!

Description:
Quiet and Central Kangaroo Flat Winner.
Welcome home, this move-in ready abode nestled in a quiet Kangaroo Flat nook awaits.
Relax and soak up the sun in your well-manicured and low-maintenance green backyard or walk to nearby Forest Lake or surrounding Reserve with the family, this three-bedroom, two-bathroom home offers the ultimate ease of living.
Whether you are looking to enter the property market as a first home-buyer, downsizing to a low-maintenance property or add to the investment portfolio, this light and bright home offers it all.
A neat modern kitchen with views of the backyard, open concept meals and living and spacious bedrooms with built-in robes and plenty of storage options throughout, you don't have to do a thing except move in.
The backyard is your ideal sanctuary with its large wrap around entertaining patio, easy-care landscaping, gravity fed water tank, concreted garden shed, colorbond fencing and handy side vehicle access.
A light-filled main bathroom with spa bath, large master suite with walk-in robe and ensuite, theatre room, spacious laundry with adequate storage and external access, and gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling adds to the appeal of this modern home.
With Lansell Square, shops, train station, medical facilities, schools, child care and a number of nearby parks on your doorstep, move straight in or advertise for immediate tenancy.
This property will be snapped up quick so contact agent Jesse Forbes for an inspection today.
PLEASE NOTE THE SPA IS NOT INCLUDED IN THE SALE BUT CAN BE PURCHASED SEPARATELY

Description:
Ready, Set, Go!
This solid brick veneer is situated in a great location in Kangaroo Flat and is set on a generous 749m2 allotment. The property offers comfortable, renovated living for the owner-occupier, or a sound investment opportunity - ready when you are!!!
This renovated home consists of three bedrooms all with built in robes, central three piece bathroom, and modern kitchen with updated gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and breakfast bar. The downlights, quality carpets and vinyl plank flooring gives this home a modern feel throughout.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling provide comfort all year round with assistance of a spilt system, gas wall heater and awnings during the summer months.
The landscaped front yard is as low maintenance as the house, with twin carport for your cars, caravan, trailer or boat.
Secure double gates gives access to an inviting backyard under established shade trees and a decked alfresco area that is perfect for summer entertaining. The garden shed and rainwater tank complete what is an all year round outdoor area.
Close to the prestigious Sandhurst Crest Estate, schools, Clubs, Lansell Square, indoor pool and sporting facilities the list is endless.
First timers, retirees, and investors you'll be excited by this little beauty. It's the perfect fit so be quick, it won't last long.
